title: HDFC and HDFC Bank announce merger of India’s largest housing finance company with the largest private bank - Business Insider India
content: HDFC and HDFC Bank announce merger of India’s largest housing finance company with the largest private bank  Business Insider India
description: HDFC and HDFC Bank today announced a merger, bringing the housing finance company under the wings of HDFC Bank.While HDFC is the largest housing finance company
